topics.summary: This topic is about hey canadians, this is for you guys and for mcdonald's. i can't tell you how many of the little toys we collected, christian.
topics.text: Hey Canadians, this is for you guys and for McDonald's. And so I'm gonna read it in my most Canadian voice possible. It's impossible to be bummed out when you think about a McDonald's happy melee. I think everyone has an nostalgic attachment to them, including me and Christian. I can't tell you how many of the little toys we collected, right, Christian? And well Canadians are very sarcastic, so I appreciate that. And we fought over the toys even with our fists. You broke my nose on one occasion. Oh man, that was actually really bad.

topics.summary: This topic is about mcdonald's cares about families, especially in canada. i wonder if the chickens are canadian.
topics.text: McDonald's cares about families, especially in Canada. So they care about the ingredients in their happy meals. The hamburgers are made with 100% beef from where else? From the plains of Canada, with no artificial preservatives, additives, or fillers. I wonder if the chickens are Canadian. And grilled chicken snack wraps. Canadian raised seasoned chicken. No artificial flavors, colors, or preservatives. Enjoy quality ingredients while spending quality time with your family, whether they're Canadian, or friends visiting from out of the country.

Transcription_Output.Transcript_Text: Hey Canadians, this is for you guys and for McDonald's. And so I'm gonna read it in my most Canadian voice possible. It's impossible to be bummed out when you think about a McDonald's happy melee. I think everyone has an nostalgic attachment to them, including me and Christian. I can't tell you how many of the little toys we collected, right, Christian? And well Canadians are very sarcastic, so I appreciate that. And we fought over the toys even with our fists. You broke my nose on one occasion. Oh man, that was actually really bad.

McDonald's cares about families, especially in Canada. So they care about the ingredients in their happy meals. The hamburgers are made with 100% beef from where else? From the plains of Canada, with no artificial preservatives, additives, or fillers. I wonder if the chickens are Canadian. And grilled chicken snack wraps. Canadian raised seasoned chicken. No artificial flavors, colors, or preservatives. Enjoy quality ingredients while spending quality time with your family, whether they're Canadian, or friends visiting from out of the country.
